name: FriendSpot
description: What is the project about? FriendSpot is a suite of Telegram tools designed around the friend.tech ecosystem - we provide alerts, sniping tools, and airdrop farming sharing through our tools. What makes your project unique? We provide many tools to our holders, and we consider ourselves as an AIO tool - users are able to do everything they want on Friend.Tech through our tools. Whatâ€™s next for your project? The team is going to deploy tax revenue into buying high-tier friend.tech shares and keys, and mirror them along with farming the airdrop. The airdrop will be distributed to holders. What can your token be used for? Buying, and selling of Friend.Tech shares through Telegram.
